Name: STAY
About the game: STAY is an Endurance Game where the [s̷u̷b̷j̷e̷c̷t̷] player will face different tasks that will appear on-screen to complete in a short time, racing to reach the highest time possible before inevitably [d̷y̷i̷n̷g̷] losing. Training Use - Test and practice your multitasking capabilities in this fast-paced game while always keeping the focus. Procedural Challenge - More than 20 randomly-alterated minigames. You never know what's next. Global Leaderboard - Compete to be the first among all the players.
